items.title: Bitcoin Price Struggles While Crypto Liquidations Top $500 Million – Analyst Flags Retail Pressure
items.description: Crypto liquidations surpassed $500 million in 24 hours, led by Bitcoin and Ethereum.

items.title: Is Netflix Gearing Up For A Year-End Rally? Retail Traders Think So After The Stock Split
items.description: The split comes after the company amends its charter to increase the number of authorized shares tenfold.

items.title: Why Is Genius Group Surging In Premarket Today?
items.description: Genius Group has filed a class action complaint against two trading firms, alleging that they manipulated its stock, seeking $250 million in damages.
